author: Simon Difford
description: Scotch new make spirit replaces light rum in this Daiquiri riff which also benefits from a combination of lime and lemon juices.
name: Fresh Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
